Sure, they're at least *pretty* comfortable and relatively lightweight. They'd be great for planes and travel if THE POCKETS ACTUALLY CLOSED. There are arbitrary strings attached to the side pockets that do absolutely nothing but snag on things you walk past. They do not function to close the pockets, so things will fall out of them, and a person's hand could easily slip into them in a crowd.  They make okay lounge pants if you cut the cords out of them, but you could also just....buy a pair of actual lounge pants for less.
I love these!

Big fan of these pants. Crafted from lightweight, breathable fabric, they offer a cooling sensation ideal for warm weather wear. Their loose fit provides ample freedom of movement, ensuring maximum comfort throughout the day. These pants are particularly well-suited for beach outings, where their relaxed vibe and functional features shine. Whether lounging by the shore or strolling along the boardwalk, they effortlessly blend comfort and style. Additionally, their versatility extends beyond beachwear, seamlessly transitioning to casual everyday attire. Overall, they exemplify the perfect fusion of comfort, functionality, and fashion, making them a must-have for any laid-back wardrobe.

These are a little too plasticy for me to wear them out but they're good for lounging or working out at home. The cargo pockets are big enough to be useful and they fit as expected (loose but not overly baggy). Overall decent quality.
Arrived quickly and was exactly what I expected. The pants fit great with the waist and ankles being adjustable. They are thin like other reviews mentioned, but that wasn't a problem for me.

These are a very comfortable pair of leisure or active pants.  They are a very baggy fit.  Any bigger at all and it would be too big.  The fabric is comfortable and not too noisy when you walk like some other similar style pants.  The drawstring waist best again and less room and the pants would be falling off.  Really like the deep side pockets.  Holds a lot of stuff without showing that your pockets are full.  Survived a few washes now and still look good as new.

I recently purchased these men's Cargo Parachute Pants, and I'm pleasantly surprised by how well they fit and feel. I'm a woman, weighing about 135 lbs, and I opted for the small size, which fits me perfectly. The pants are not only comfortable but also stylish, and I love the cargo pockets for their added utility. The quality of the fabric and stitching is impressive, and they seem durable enough for regular wear. If you're a woman looking for a comfortable and trendy pair of cargo pants, don't hesitate to consider these men's pants in a smaller size. They provide a great fit and a cool, relaxed style that's perfect for various occasions.

I like the pants since they are one of the most comfortable pairs I now own but they give off alot of static electricity and will attract tons of dog hairs. I have 2 pitbulls and I put these pants on for just 5 minutes and was standing up the whole time with the dogs in another room. I took them off after trying them on and the pants were covered with dog hairs. You could feel the static, it was that strong. With that said make sure you get the static out of the pants first before trying them on. The pants themselves are very comfortable to wear though, I believe they are worth buying for the comfort alone.

These are just ok. A little thinner than I’d hoped for. They fit ok. They look ok, but they sure do attract dog hair a lot. Overall just an ok pair of lounge pants. I wouldn’t ware them in public though lol

评论概述: allowing for easy movements without any hindrance when squatting or standing up.
评论详情: The loose fit provides excellent comfort, allowing for easy movements without any hindrance when squatting or standing up. The drawstring adds a nice touch to the casual look, and the pocket design is both stylish and functional.  However, one downside is the synthetic fabric, which tends to generate significant static electricity and attracts a lot of lint and hair.

These pants are as advertised and true to size.  The material is soft and light weight.  The big pockets on both sides do not close; it's just a flap and one of the pockets have two slits (each can fit a cell phone).  However, when you place anything in either slit it goes into the actual pocket which is not divided all the way down.These are nice pants for summer and fall although it can be worn year-round but won't be warm in winter months.  If lightweight cargo pants are what you're going for-then these are nice.
Great fit and elegant feeling fabric.
